title: I don't understand how Nasus is not toxic or broken
body:
He's unfun to play against. he now slows, q's more than ever, his build allows more attack speed, heals, and tanks. split pushes these paper thin towers, so they don't help you.
It's like he's what pantheon wishes he was. i feel he's very toxic, but why isn't he. and if your reason is "because u counter pick x champ with x champ" then that's not a good reason at all.
I understand that he can be bad in teamfights and organized play, big emphasis on CAN, but overall with the shitty towers, he just feels even more toxic than pantheon to lane against. 
Re posting because assholes will down vote and troll with no feed back

replies.body: Explaining weaknesses about the champion or how to play against him is just going to see an argument so I'll tell you this. If you think a champion is overpowered or you don't know how to play against it, play a few games as them. You'l realize their weaknesses when others beat you. Either you win all the time with the champion because they're broken, or you discover their weaknesses. If you win, you win. If you lose, you learn.

i'm not looking for an argument. i literally say to tell me how he isn't. what the fuck is wrong with people here? 
Yeah i get that. I've mained nasus in the past and all he has gotten is buffs. so i'm sure it won't change his feel too much. I get you shut him down early, but honestly this *end before 20 min* mentality of the game and champions like nasus just feel toxic. I believe he's broken, or toxic, because of his kit and the buffs they were forced to make to him. He's unfun to play against, unfair to trade, and just overall a pantheon

My measure of whether a melee champion is op is whether or not I have fun playing as them. Since I greatly prefer ranged champs, if I am having fun on a melee then they are op. I have fun on Nasus.

I also banned Nasus all the way through my climb this season.

However, just because you or I dislike playing against something does not mean it has to be changed. Just play him or ban him like I did.

The game being on a timer matter is something of a moot point once preseason hits since 4 different runes allow uncapped scaling, so at that point you can play whatever you want and keep up anyway.
